data.title: Scale9Sprite doesn't apply Global Z order to protected children
iOS: ARC support #12518
data.body:
Ability to easily turn on/off ARC support in 'Build Settings' for template project (and only for it). Cocos2d-x engine itself is not affected.

It's safe to have outer project with arc support and libraries/frameworks/depended projects with or without arc support.

data.title: popScene的BUG
cocos2d-x debug on Android/
data.body: Unable to start debugging on the cocos2d-x Android Studio. Android Studio requires the use Gradel 2.5. Does anyone at all happen?

data.title: Extend API of TextField
data.body:
Added extended methods to TextField:
- getStringNumLines
- getLineHeight
- setLineBreakWithoutSpace

data.title: socket.io 1.3.6 can't create custom namespace
data.body:
@himynameschris 
Tried with server code from 
https://github.com/himynameschris/socket.io-testserver

SocketIO::connect("http://localhost:3010/testpoint", *this);

can only connect to default namespace. 

this is the server log
  socket.io:socket socket connected - writing packet +0ms
  socket.io:socket joining room I6LarO9Dg0hqscrpAAAA +12ms
connection
  socket.io:socket joined room I6LarO9Dg0hqscrpAAAA +36ms

and this is the log from cocos2d-x
SocketIOHelper::init called, connecting to url : ws://127.0.0.1:3010/testpoint
SIOClientImpl::init() successful
SIOClientImpl::handshake() called
SIOClientImpl::handshake() waiting
In the constructor of HttpClient!
SIOClientImpl::handshakeResponse() called
handshake completed
response code: 200
SIOClientImpl::handshake() succeeded
SIOClientImpl::handshake() dump data: 97:0{"sid":"S91jNvR2YZpu4ifsAAAI","upgrades":["websocket"],"pingInterval":25000,"pingTimeout":60000}
SIOClientImpl::handshake() Socket.IO 1.x detected
done parsing 1.x
SIOClientImpl::openSocket() called
[WebSocket::init] _host: 127.0.0.1, _port: 3010, _path: /socket.io/1/websocket/?EIO=2&transport=websocket&sid=S91jNvR2YZpu4ifsAAAI
[1442582986:2844] NOTICE: Initial logging level 7
[1442582986:2845] NOTICE: Library version: 1.3 901bc8d
[1442582986:2845] NOTICE: IPV6 compiled in and enabled
[1442582986:2845] NOTICE: libev support not compiled in
[1442582986:2845] NOTICE:  static allocation: 4496 + (16 x 1024 fds) = 20880 bytes
[1442582986:2846] NOTICE:  per-conn mem: 184 + 1594 headers + protocol rx buf
-->SEND:40::/testpoint,:
SIOClientImpl::onOpen socket connected!
SIOClientImpl::onMessage received: 40
Message code: [4]
Socket Connected
SIOClientImpl::onMessage received: 42["message","Simple message test from default namespace"]

event name message between 1 and 7

Event Received (["message",{"name":"myname","type":"mytype"}])
event name message between 1 and 7
SIOClientImpl::onMessage received: 42["testevent",{"name":"myname","type":"mytype"}]
Message code: [4]
Event Received (["testevent",{"name":"myname","type":"mytype"}])
event name testevent between 1 and 9
-->SEND:2:::
Heartbeat sent

data.title: Event can't be received when calling addEventListener and dispatchEvent inside dispatchEvent.
Refine components to improve physics performance
Feature request: 3D MotionStreak
data.body: Similar to 2D motion streak, 3D Motion streak is needed which can be used in trail of motion

data.title: [Web Engine] Fix setColor and Opacity in uiButton
data.body:
- Should not setOpacity while setColor.
- There exists a mechanism in the Engine that when visit the protected nodes attached to button, `_synStatus` will be called, in which color and opacity will be changed as button did. 
- Avoid set repetitive attributes.
